name: IODEFV2-Document

Incident.name: Incident
Incident.description: The information related to a single incident.

lang.name: lang
lang.description: A valid language code per RFC 4646 [7] constrained by the definition of "xs:language".  The interpretation of this code is described in Section 6.

formatid.name: formatid
formatid.description: A free-form string to convey processing instructions to the recipient of the document.  Its semantics must be negotiated out-of-band.

version.name: version
version.description: The IODEF specification version number to which this IODEF document conforms.  The value of this attribute MUST be "1.00"

description: The IODEF-Document class is the top level class in the IODEF data model.  All IODEF documents are an instance of this class.
